page.title: 01Blackmore
page.content: {Blackmore}is a small village in the middle of Essex.It is eight miles away from the county town of Chelmsford.The adult{population}of the parish is 4013.The{landscape}is beautiful the village being set in a valley surrounded by fields and woods.It a very tidy village and holds the trophy for the best kept village in Essex. Blackmore has{clubs}for children and adults and it also has several {religious}groups and two churches one is Baptist and the other Church of England.There is a primary{school}in Blackmore,public{library},post office, newsagent and two grocery shops.For younger children there is a play group.There is a village hall and{ {sports}complex in Blackmore with a recreation field for children. Blackmore is served well with public {transport}.
